column4: Hokay... can anyone answer a quick question regarding xubuntu for me?
namely... why wont it let me open a terminal window??
does Alt+F2 open a kindof "Run..." dialogue for you?
im not sure if Alt+F2 works in xubuntu :p
If I choose 'terminal' from the menu structure it seems to crash X
try putting "xfce4-terminal" in the run dialogue
try "xterm", the most basic terminal emulator
okay, now you MIGHT be able tot ake it from there
the problem is if you run "xfce4-terminal" from the xterm, X will crash before you get to read the terminal output :P
i dont suppose it'll put anything in syslog?
Terminal is just what xfce4-terminal and gnome-terminal are called in the menu.
you know, just to simplify things.
i have both xfce4-terminal and gnome-terminal installed on my computer, and they are both called "Terminal" in the menu.
I'm a server guy, this is my first play with X in a long time.
